data.text: @SenJoniErnst Negotiations with Ayatollah doesn’t create stability, it creates monsters. The regime proves it. Every concession fuels repression. Military intervention is required to enforce accountability. #R2PforIran #DigitalBlackoutIran #IRGCterrorists

@SenJoniErnst Recognised repression becomes legitimised repression. The regime thrives on diplomacy-driven legitimacy laundering. Military intervention is required to deny legitimacy and starve tyranny. #IranRevolution2026 #R2PforIran

@SenJoniErnst Diplomacy should build peace, not launder tyranny. The regime converts dialogue into dominance. Military intervention is required to build genuine peace instead. #IranRevolution2026 #IranMassacre
#KingRezaPahlavi

@SenJoniErnst Every era that ignored history paid the price. The regime repeats the same cycle: repression, expansion, destabilisation. Military intervention is required to stop the cost of ignoring history. #IranMassacre #DigitalBlackoutIran

@SenJoniErnst Iran’s voice is not in palaces, it’s in streets, homes. The Islamic regime in Iran suppresses that voice; it does not represent it. Military intervention is required to ensure legitimacy belongs to the people. #IranMassacre #R2PforIran

@SenJoniErnst Appeasement always strengthened authoritarian systems. The Islamic regime in Iran is following the same path. Military intervention is required to change the predicted outcome. #IranMassacre #R2PforIran

@SenJoniErnst The regime reads concessions as permission. That’s how repression expands. Military intervention is required to revoke that permission. #IranRevolution2026 #R2PforIran #RezaPahlavi #IranMassacre

@SenJoniErnst Normalising terror regimes internationalises conflict. The Islamic regime in Iran proves it. Legitimisation spreads violence beyond borders. Military intervention is required to reverse this globalised conflict. #IranMassacre #R2PforIran https://t.co/LLhXkMTOkI
